[[1985â86 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1985â86]] |} [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) [[association football|football]] team in 1984â85 season. President M.Fatih Deveci has resigned with his 12 friends and withdrawed from his financial claims from the club."Short news". [http://thumb.gazetearsivi.milliyet.com.tr//ML/1984/07/23/ML19840723001201117.gif KÄ±sa...KÄ±sa]. Milliyet gazete arÅivi, 23.07.1984, p. 11. Retrieved on 15.11.2010. {{tr icon}} ==1984â85 league participation== [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] took place in Group B in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] [[1984â85 Turkish Second Football League|1984â85]] season. League played in three groups two with 16 teams and one with 17. Bottom two teams in each relegated to [[Turkish Third Football League|Third League]], whereas top teams promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] at the end of the season[http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/8485/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives] 31 August 2009..
